welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Carmen, El Salvador! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city, known for its rich cultural heritage and breathtaking landscapes. We invite you to explore and embrace all that El Carmen has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport is used for transporting goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Salvador International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at El Salvador International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
